name: Super Strike Beach Volleyball
description:
Train your character to become the best in Campaign Mode! See how many opponents you can defeat in a row in Survivor Mode! Play at your own pace and relax in Free Play Mode! With eight characters to choose from – each with their own unique Super Shot – you're free to mix and match to make the ultimate beach volleyball duo! Can you defeat your rivals to become King of the Beach? It's up to you!

  • Train your character in six attributes!
  • Three different modes of play!
  • Alternate swimsuits and unique Super Shots!
